title: heslo
author: heslo
content: Chasing after a Steam Deck as they're not available in my country and resellers (scalpers) here want blood money for them.Anyone got one they're looking to sell?

comments.author: ncsupanda
comments.body: What country?I get these in occasionally, though to your point they are scalped beyond belief atm.
